ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Exclusive Project', AND( ISPICKVAL(os_Status__c , 'Offering'), ISPICKVAL(os_InquiryType__c , 'Agency' ), ISBLANK( os_B2B_Agent__c ) ), CreatedDate > DATETIMEVALUE("2023-08-24 00:00:00") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: B2B Agent Required for Offering and Agency Inquiry
